mapper.select: select t.id as id, t.title as title, t.executed_date as executedDate, t.author_name as authorName, t.case_category as caseCategory, t.last_run_status as lastRunStatus from test_cycle_join_test_case tc join test_case t on tc.test_case_id = t.id join test_cycle c on tc.test_cycle_id = c.id where c.id = #{testCycleId}

select testCycleId, testCaseId, executeStatus, group_concat(status) as runStatus from( select t.test_cycle_id as testCycleId, t.test_case_id as testCaseId, t.execute_status as executeStatus, 0 as status from test_cycle_join_test_case t where t.test_cycle_id = #{testCycleId} union select t.test_cycle_id as testCycleId, t.test_case_id as testCaseId, t.execute_status as executeStatus, tcs.status as status from test_cycle_join_test_case t join test_case_step tcs on t.test_case_id = tcs.test_case_id where t.test_cycle_id = #{testCycleId} ) as tmp group by tmp.testCaseId
select t.execute_status as executeStatus from test_cycle_join_test_case t where t.test_cycle_id = #{testCycleId}
select test_case_id from test_cycle_join_test_case where test_cycle_id = #{testCycleId}
